title: First Brands Trade Financier Seeks to Halt Its Use of Some Cash
description: A major trade finance partner of First Brands Group threatened its right to keep tapping cash made available to the bankrupt auto parts supplier, saying the value of some of its collateral has fallen below agreed-upon thresholds.
content: A major trade finance partner of First Brands Group threatened its right to keep tapping cash made available to the bankrupt auto parts supplier, saying the value of some of its collateral has fallen below agreed-upon thresholds.
